# PlayCanvas Developer Documentation

> PlayCanvas is an open-source WebGL/WebGPU 3D game engine for creating interactive experiences and games that run in the browser.

This file provides a structured overview of the PlayCanvas documentation.
For the complete documentation content, see: https://developer.playcanvas.com/llms-full.txt

Base URL: https://developer.playcanvas.com
Total Documents: 566
Generated: 2026-01-03

## Recommended Entry Points

- Getting Started: /user-manual/getting-started/
- PlayCanvas Editor: /user-manual/editor/
- PlayCanvas Engine: /user-manual/engine/
- PlayCanvas React: /user-manual/playcanvas-react/
- Web Components: /user-manual/web-components/
- Scripting: /user-manual/scripting/
- Gaussian Splatting: /user-manual/gaussian-splatting/
- Graphics: /user-manual/graphics/
- Physics: /user-manual/physics/
- XR (VR/AR): /user-manual/xr/

### PCUI

- https://developer.playcanvas.com/tutorials/world-to-ui-screen-space/ - World to UI Screen space

## Shader Editor

- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/ - Shader Editor

- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/introduction/ - Introduction

### Overview
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/overview/ - Overview
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/overview/file-handling/ - File Handling
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/overview/graphs/ - Graphs
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/overview/graphs/material-graphs/ - Material Graphs
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/overview/graphs/sub-graphs/ - Sub Graphs
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/overview/materials/ - Materials
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/overview/nodes/ - Nodes
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/overview/nodes/parameter-nodes/ - Parameter Nodes
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/overview/textures/ - Textures
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/overview/workflow/ - Workflow

### Window Layout
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/window-layout/ - Window Layout
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/window-layout/assets-pane/ - Assets Pane
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/window-layout/graph-editor/ - Graph Editor
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/window-layout/info-pane/ - Info Pane
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/window-layout/inspector-pane/ - Inspector Pane
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/window-layout/inspector-pane/graph-inspector/ - Graph Inspector
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/window-layout/inspector-pane/material-inspector/ - Material Inspector
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/window-layout/inspector-pane/node-inspector/ - Node Inspector
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/window-layout/inspector-pane/texture-inspector/ - Texture Inspector
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/window-layout/nodes-pane/ - Nodes Pane
- https://developer.playcanvas.com/shader-editor/window-layout/preview-pane/ - Preview Pane
